## ObservabilityTools.createConsoleObservabilityContext() function

Creates a console-based observability context for development and debugging.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createConsoleObservabilityContext(diagLogLevel?: Logging.ReporterLogLevel, userLogLevel?: Logging.ReporterLogLevel): IObservabilityContext;
```
